summary: Gay older Parisian takes home a drunken American found in the street. A romantic connection forms despite the younger man's secret - he's famous.
cast: Yann de Monterno|Florence d'Azémar|Kevin Miranda|Cyril Legann|Mateo de Leon|Carine Baïsseteguy|Lynn Richardson|Lynn Richardson|Nicolas Priouzeau|Cyril Legros|Todd Verow|Judy Minx|Cherie|Cherie|Daniel Osorio
title: La calle de los chicos malos
